languages.text: "Я скорблю, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Мы сделали то, что должно, но это не мешает мне горевать об {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}утрате{/d}. Душа Инцендии пусть и была заблудшей, но все же она была чище, чем у многих аспидов, что кличут себя святыми отцами Экклезиархии. Ее жизнь могла бы многим послужить примером истинной веры..."

traits.locale_text: "Я скорблю, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Мы сделали то, что должно, но это не мешает мне горевать об утрате. Душа Инцендии пусть и была заблудшей, но все же она была чище, чем у многих аспидов, что кличут себя святыми отцами Экклезиархии. Ее жизнь могла бы многим послужить примером истинной веры..."

languages.text: "I grieve, young von Valancius. We did what we had to, but I mourn our {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}loss{/d} all the same. Incendia's soul may have been lost, but it was still purer than that of many vipers that call themselves holy fathers of the Ecclesiarchy. Her life could have served as an example of true faith to many..."
languages.original_text: "Я скорблю, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Мы сделали то, что должно, но это не мешает мне горевать об {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}утрате{/d}. Душа Инцендии пусть и была заблудшей, но все же она была чище, чем у многих аспидов, что кличут себя святыми отцами Экклезиархии. Ее жизнь могла бы многим послужить примером истинной веры..."

traits.locale_text: "I grieve, my {mf|son|daughter}. We did what we had to, but I mourn our loss all the same. Incendia's soul may have been lost, but it was still purer than that of many asps that call themselves holy fathers of the Ecclesiarchy. Her life could have served as an example of true faith to many..."

Her life could have served as an example of true faith to many..."

languages.text: 「悲しいかな、若きフォン・ヴァランシウス様。やるべきことはいたしましたが、それでも{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}失った{/d}ものを嘆いていることに変わりはありません。インセンディア様の魂は迷っておられましたが、帝国聖教会の聖なる神父を自称する愚か者どもよりはずっと純粋でした。彼女の人生は多くの者に真の信仰を示す模範になりえたでしょうに…」
languages.original_text: "I grieve, young von Valancius. We did what we had to, but I mourn our {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}loss{/d} all the same. Incendia's soul may have been lost, but it was still purer than that of many vipers that call themselves holy fathers of the Ecclesiarchy. Her life could have served as an example of true faith to many..."

traits.locale_text: 「悲しいかな、若きフォン・ヴァランシウス様。やるべきことはいたしましたが、それでも{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}失った{/d}ものを嘆いていることに変わりはありません。インセンディア様の魂は迷っておられましたが、帝国聖教会の聖なる神父を自称する愚か者どもよりはずっと純粋でした。彼女の人生は多くの者に真の信仰を示す模範になりえたでしょうに…」

languages.text: « Je suis bien triste, jeune von Valancius. Ce que nous avons fait était nécessaire, mais ça ne m'empêche pas d'avoir des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}regrets{/d}. Même si l'âme d'Incendia était perdue, elle n'en restait pas moins plus pure que celle de nombreux serpents qui se prétendent les saints pères de l'Ecclésiarchie. Sa vie aurait pu servir d'exemple de foi véritable pour bien des gens... »
languages.original_text: "I grieve, young von Valancius. We did what we had to, but I mourn our {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}loss{/d} all the same. Incendia's soul may have been lost, but it was still purer than that of many vipers that call themselves holy fathers of the Ecclesiarchy. Her life could have served as an example of true faith to many..."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis bien triste, jeune von Valancius. Ce que nous avons fait était nécessaire, mais ça ne m'empêche pas d'avoir des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}regrets{/d}. Même si l'âme d'Incendia était perdue, elle n'en restait pas moins plus pure que celle de nombreux serpents qui se prétendent les saints pères de l'Ecclésiarchie. Sa vie aurait pu servir d'exemple de foi véritable pour bien des gens... »

languages.text: “我很悲痛，年轻的冯·瓦兰修斯。我们做了必须要做的事情，但我依然为我们的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}损失{/d}悲痛不已。或许因森蒂娅的灵魂误入了歧途，但她依然比国教之中许多道貌岸然的毒蛇更加纯洁。她的人生，本可以成为许多真正虔诚之人的榜样……”
languages.original_text: "I grieve, young von Valancius. We did what we had to, but I mourn our {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}loss{/d} all the same. Incendia's soul may have been lost, but it was still purer than that of many vipers that call themselves holy fathers of the Ecclesiarchy. Her life could have served as an example of true faith to many..."

traits.locale_text: “我很悲痛，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。我们做了必须要做的事情，但我依然为我们的损失悲痛不已。或许因森蒂娅的灵魂误入了歧途，但她依然比国教许多道貌岸然的神父更加纯洁，她的人生本可以成为许多真正虔诚之人的榜样……”

languages.text: "Ich bin betrübt, {mf|junger|junge} von Valancius. Wir haben getan, was wir tun mussten, aber dennoch schmerzt mich unser {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}Verlust{/d}. Incendias Seele mag verloren gewesen sein, aber sie war dennoch reiner als die vieler Vipern, die sich heilige Väter der Ekklesiarchie nennen. Ihr Leben hätte vielen als Vorbild für wahren Glauben dienen können ..."
languages.original_text: "I grieve, young von Valancius. We did what we had to, but I mourn our {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}loss{/d} all the same. Incendia's soul may have been lost, but it was still purer than that of many vipers that call themselves holy fathers of the Ecclesiarchy. Her life could have served as an example of true faith to many..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich trauere, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}. Wir haben getan, was wir tun mussten, aber dennoch schmerzt mich unser Verlust. Incendias Seele mag verloren gewesen sein, aber sie war dennoch reiner als die vieler Schlangen, die sich heilige Väter der Ekklesiarchie nennen. Ihr Leben hätte vielen als Vorbild für wahren Glauben dienen können ..."

"Ich bin betrübt, {mf|junger|junge} von Valancius. Wir haben getan, was wir tun mussten, aber dennoch schmerzt mich unser Verlust. Incendias Seele mag verloren gewesen sein, aber sie war dennoch reiner als die vieler Vipern, die sich heilige Väter der Ekklesiarchie nennen. Ihr Leben hätte vielen als Vorbild für wahren Glauben dienen können ..."

languages.text: «Me entristece, joven von Valancius. Hemos hecho lo justo, pero me apena su {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}fallecimiento{/d}. El alma de Incendia, ahora perdida, era más pura que la de muchos de las víboras que se hacen llamar padres sagrados de la Eclesiarquía. Podría haber sido un ejemplo de auténtica fe para muchos...».
languages.original_text: "I grieve, young von Valancius. We did what we had to, but I mourn our {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}loss{/d} all the same. Incendia's soul may have been lost, but it was still purer than that of many vipers that call themselves holy fathers of the Ecclesiarchy. Her life could have served as an example of true faith to many..."

traits.locale_text: «Me entristece, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. Hemos hecho lo justo, pero me apena su fallecimiento. El alma de Incendia, ahora perdida, era más pura que la de muchos de los áspides que se hacen llamar padres sagrados de la Eclesiarquía. Podría haber sido un ejemplo de auténtica fe para muchos...».

languages.text: "Yastayım genç von Valancius. Yapmamız gerekeni yaptık ama yine de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}kaybımız{/d} için matemliyim. İncendia yanlış bir yola sapmış olmasına rağmen kendilerine Ekleşiarşi'nin kutsal babaları diyen sürüngenlerin çoğundan daha saf bir kalbe sahipti. Hayatı, inancı güçlü olan birçok kişi için örnek teşkil edebilirdi."
languages.original_text: "I grieve, young von Valancius. We did what we had to, but I mourn our {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_ChordaDead}loss{/d} all the same. Incendia's soul may have been lost, but it was still purer than that of many vipers that call themselves holy fathers of the Ecclesiarchy. Her life could have served as an example of true faith to many..."

traits.locale_text: "Yastayım genç von Valancius. Yapmamız gerekeni yaptık ama yine de kaybımız için matemliyim. İncendia yanlış bir yola sapmış olabilir ama yine de kendilerine Ekleşiarşi'nin kutsal babaları diyen sürüngenlerin çoğundan daha saf bir kalbe sahipti. Yaşamı, inancı güçlü olan birçok kişi için bir örnek teşkil edebilirdi."
